data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ZWALUW cruise from Texel to Suriname started at 1833-06-26

Ship: Zwaluw (Brik), Voyage: Texel - Suriname, 1st Observer: A.J. Tam (Kltz), Company: MAR, Other ship information: SCHIP IS GEWAPEND MET 16 CARRONADES A 24 POND. 2 KANONEN A 6 POND. 1 CARRONADES A 12 POND. HET SCHIP IS BEMAND MET 110 KOPPEN
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
